title: [Other] **On-Call Procedures**: No defined on-call rotation or escalation.
body_preview: Why: Unclear ownership for incidents. Next: Define on-call schedule (even if solo); add PagerDuty or email alerts; document handoff procedures.

title: [Other] **Chaos Engineering & Load Testing**: No resilience testing (e.g., kill pods, simulate
body_preview: failures) or load benchmarks. Why: Unknown failure modes under stress. Next: Use Chaos Mesh for K8s; add k6/JMeter scripts for load testing against SLOs (e.g., 1000 req/s).

title: [Other] **Backup & Recovery Implementation**: No automated backups for Postgres/Redis/object
body_preview: store; no restore tests. Why: Data loss risk. Next: Add cron jobs for DB dumps; implement point-in-time recovery; schedule monthly restore drills with verification.

title: [Other] **Incident Runbooks Development**: Outlines exist in ops-and-observability.md but no
body_preview: detailed playbooks for common issues (e.g., DB outage, agent failure). Why: Slow MTTR. Next: Expand runbooks with step-by-step actions, escalation paths, and post-mortems; test via tabletop exercises.

title: [Other] **App Startup Failure Debugging**: App exits with code 1 on run (python app.py); no
body_preview: logs or error output captured. Why: Unreliable deployment and testing. Next: Add try/except in app.py for startup errors, log to stderr/file; run with verbose flags to capture stack traces; fix root cause (e.g., Redis connection, missing env vars).
